sailpoint.connector

Class ConnectorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.connector.ConnectorFactory

  • public class ConnectorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The ConnectorFactory factory to aid in getting connectors.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnector

        public static Connector getConnector(Application applicationToClone,
                                     java.lang.String instance)
                              throws GeneralException
        Build a connector object using a clone of the given application.

        This method would normally be called getConnectorWithClone, but remains getConnector for backward compatibility.

        Parameters:
        applicationToClone - the application which is cloned and used to build the Connector
        instance - the instance for template redirection
        Returns:
        a ConnectorProxy object that provides transformation and redirection services around the real connector class.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getConnectorNoClone

        public static Connector getConnectorNoClone(Application application,
                                            java.lang.String instance)
                                     throws GeneralException
        Build a connector object directly from the given application
        Parameters:
        application - the application used to build the Connector
        instance - the instance for template redirection
        Returns:
        a ConnectorProxy object that provides transformation and redirection services around the real connector class.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getCompositeConnector

        public static sailpoint.connector.LogicalConnector getCompositeConnector(Application app)
                                                                  throws GeneralException
        Special factory method to see if the connector supports the CompositeConnector interface and returns that instead of Connector. This is necessary because getConnector returns a ConnectorProxy so we can't use instanceof to tell if the actual connector also implements CompositeConnector.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • createConnector

        public static Connector createConnector(java.lang.String name,
                                        Application app,
                                        java.lang.String instance)
                                 throws GeneralException
        Method will create a new Connector instance, calling the constructor that takes in an application.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getApplication

        public static Application getApplication(Application originalApp)
                                  throws GeneralException
        Clone the application ( deep-copy using xml ) and then decrypt any of the passwords on the application.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • destroyConnector

        public static void destroyConnector(Application application,
                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> optionsMap)
                             throws GeneralException
        Some connectors may hold onto resources when iterating across multiple partitions (even after close() is called on the CloseableIterators). Call this method to clean up after all partitions have been processed.
        Parameters:
        application - The Application for the connector to destroy.
        optionsMap - Map of options sent by aggregator
        Throws:
        GeneralException
